The 2nd International Symposium on Life Sciences

The 2nd International Symposium on Life Sciences will be held at Harbin Institute of Technology on July 8, 2025. This conference is hosted by the School of Life Science and Technology, HIT. This conference, with the theme of "Mechanisms of Chronic Diseases", plans to invite renowned experts and scholars from world famous universities in the UK, Korea, Japan, China and other countries to exchange views on the latest research progress in this field. This conference will offer an academic feast and an opportunity for international exchange for scholars and young students engaged in the basic research of life sciences and medicine. We sincerely invite your participation.

 

Main contents of the symposium:

(1) Keynote speech;

(2) Invited speech;

(3) Oral presentation from PhD students;

(4) Poster report from PhD students.

Date and time:

July 8, 2025,  Timeï¼š8:30-17:40

Place of the symposium:

Activity Centerï¼ŒHarbin Institute of Technology

Contacts:

Shi Shuliang: liangss@hit.edu.cn, 13946078105

Cong Hua : conghua@hit.edu.cn,13946161233

He Hongjuan: hehongjuan0727@163.com,13836147259
